name: Sealed (MarinoMan)
description:
A game by Left Marino

Music by Komiku

Who are you? What powers brought you to this land? 

You find yourself in the middle of a clearing. Your memory fuzzy, your leg hurts from a fall you don't remember but certainly can feel. 

You only remember a couple of words:

GO

SEARCH

END SUFFERING

You find a stick to help you stand...

What awaits you at the end of the clearing, you only have to take a couple of steps and see for yourself. 

Discover the weird world ruled by seemingly only animals.

Jump, duck and attack at the right time to avoid meeting your end. 

Explore every nook and cranny, nearly everything is interactable in a meaningful way. One man's trash is another animals treasure.

Choose wisely, your actions have consequences and most if not all will remember what you've done.

Befriend the huge and diverse cast of Sealed and unlock new gameplay options.

Fight small and huge, the world is full of small insects and huge monsters for you to fight or befriend.

Join me in my endeavour to create Sealed. I am a one man team. That means art, game dev, trouble shooting and QA is all handled by me. Music is done by the Brilliant Komiku.  I need all the love and support I can get to bring people the culmination of my gamedev/writing/art journey. 

Discord:  https://discord.gg/TxZwZK43

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeMIw2l1VSuNBP9WXsBAYxw

Twitter: @OfficialSealed

My main goal for now is to polish the demo as much as possible and create an attractive game, both story and gameplay wise.  After that comes the fun but gruelling process of creating the rest of the game. 

Any support is welcome, but your helpful criticism and love will help the most! 

Yours truly,

Left
